mapper.select: SELECT /*pahalfclaim.xml : selectExchangeCompleteList by PaHalfClaimController*/ POM.PA_CODE , POM.PA_ORDER_NO AS ORD_NO , POM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AS ORD_NO_NM , '01' AS STATE_CD , POM.MAPPING_SEQ , 'Y' AS CONFIRM_Y_N , POM.ORDER_NO FROM TPAORDERM POM , TCLAIMDT CL WHERE POM.ORDER_NO = CL.ORDER_NO AND POM.ORDER_G_SEQ = CL.ORDER_G_SEQ AND POM.ORDER_D_SEQ = CL.ORDER_D_SEQ AND POM.ORDER_W_SEQ = CL.ORDER_W_SEQ AND POM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND POM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' AND POM.PA_DO_FLAG != '60' AND CL.DO_FLAG = '60' AND POM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB = '0' AND CL.LAST_PROC_DATE > SYSDATE - 7

SELECT POM.PA_CLAIM_NO /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectReturnApprovalList by PaHalfClaimController*/ , POM.PA_CODE , NVL(PO.ORI_ORD_NO , PO.ORD_NO) AS ORD_NO , POM.MAPPING_SEQ , POM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AS ORD_NO_NM , '01' AS STATE_CD , 'Y' AS CONFIRM_Y_N , POM.ORDER_NO FROM TPAORDERM POM , TPAHALFORDERLIST PO , TCLAIMDT CL WHERE POM.ORDER_NO = CL.ORDER_NO AND POM.ORDER_D_SEQ = CL.ORDER_D_SEQ AND POM.ORDER_G_SEQ = CL.ORDER_G_SEQ AND POM.ORDER_W_SEQ = CL.ORDER_W_SEQ AND POM.PA_ORDER_NO = PO.ORD_NO AND POM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PO.ORD_NO_NM AND POM.PA_SHIP_NO = PO.BASKET_NO AND POM.PA_CLAIM_NO = PO.CLAIM_NO AND POM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND POM.PA_ORDER_GB = '30' AND POM.PA_DO_FLAG != '60' AND CL.DO_FLAG = '60' AND CL.LAST_PROC_DATE > SYSDATE - 30

SELECT ( /* pahalfclaim.xml: pahalf.claim.selectAvailableCalim by PaHalfClaimController*/ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TPAHALFORDERLIST PO , TPAORDERM PM WHERE PO.ORD_NO = PM.PA_ORDER_NO AND PO.ORD_NO_NM = PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PO.BASKET_NO = PM.PA_SHIP_NO AND PO.CLAIM_NO = PM.PA_CLAIM_NO AND PM.CREATE_YN = '1' AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = #{orgPaOrderGb , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = #{ordNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = #{ordNoNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = #{basketNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS CLAIM_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TPAHALFORDERLIST PO , TPAORDERM PM WHERE PO.ORD_NO = PM.PA_ORDER_NO AND PO.ORD_NO_NM = PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PO.BASKET_NO = PA_SHIP_NO AND PO.CLAIM_NO = PM.PA_CLAIM_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = #{paOrderGb , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PRE_CANCEL_YN!= '1' AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = #{ordNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = #{ordNoNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = #{basketNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS CLAIM_CANCEL_CNT FROM DUAL

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectExchangeGoodsdt by PaHalfClaimController*/ PO.GOODS_CODE , PO.GOODSDT_CODE FROM TPAHALFGOODS PG , TPAPRODUCTOPTION PO WHERE PG.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND PG.GOODS_CODE = PO.GOODS_CODE AND PG.PRODUCT_NO = #{prdNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PO.SALE_GB = '00'

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectExchangeGoodsDtCode by PaHalfClaimController*/ PGD.GOODSDT_CODE FROM TPAHALFGOODS HG , TPAHALFGOODSDTMAPPING PGD WHERE HG.PA_CODE = PGD.PA_CODE AND HG.GOODS_CODE = PGD.GOODS_CODE AND HG.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PGD.PA_OPTION_CODE = #{paOptionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectOrderClaimTargetDt30 by PaHalfAsyncController*/ CL.MAPPING_SEQ , CL.PA_ORDER_NO , CL.PA_ORDER_SEQ , CL.PA_CLAIM_NO , CL.ORDER_NO , CL.ORDER_G_SEQ , CL.ORDER_D_SEQ , CL.ORDER_W_SEQ , CL.CLAIM_GB , CL.CLAIM_QTY , CL.CLAIM_DESC , CL.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , CL.CUST_DELY_YN , DECODE(CL.CUST_DELY_YN, '1', CL.RETURN_DELY_GB , '') AS RETURN_DELY_GB , DECODE(CL.CUST_DELY_YN, '1', CL.RETURN_SLIP_NO , '') AS RETURN_SLIP_NO , CL.ADMIN_PROC_YN , CL.RETURN_NAME , CL.RETURN_TEL , CL.RETURN_HP , CL.RETURN_ADDR , CL.RCVR_MAIL_NO , CL.RCVR_MAIL_NO_SEQ , CL.RCVR_BASE_ADDR , CL.RCVR_DTLS_ADDR , CL.RCVR_TYPE_ADD , CL.CLAIM_CODE , CL.CLM_LST_DLV_CST , CL.INSERT_ID , CL.MSG FROM ( SELECT PM.MAPPING_SEQ , PM.PA_ORDER_NO , PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ , PM.PA_CLAIM_NO , OPM.ORDER_NO , OPM.ORDER_G_SEQ , OPM.ORDER_D_SEQ , OPM.ORDER_W_SEQ , PM.PA_ORDER_GB AS CLAIM_GB , PM.PA_PROC_QTY AS CLAIM_QTY , PC.REFUND_BS_MEMO AS CLAIM_DESC , PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , DECODE(PC.BP_PICKUP_TYPE_NM, '업체직접수거', '0', '1') AS CUST_DELY_YN , NVL((SELECT CASE WHEN XX.PA_DELY_GB = '39' THEN '40' ELSE XX.DELY_GB END FROM ( SELECT * FROM TPADELYGB G WHERE G.PA_CODE = '12' AND G.PA_DELY_GB = PC.DELIRTN_OFF_NO) XX WHERE ROWNUM = 1), '40') AS RETURN_DELY_GB , NVL(PC.DELIRTN_NO,'고객직접배송') AS RETURN_SLIP_NO , '0' AS ADMIN_PROC_YN , PC.REFUND_FROM_NM AS RETURN_NAME , REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(NVL(PC.REFUND_FROM_TEL , PC.REFUND_FROM_EM_TEL), 'D') , '-', '') AS RETURN_TEL , REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(NVL(DECODE(PC.REFUND_FROM_EM_TEL,'010','') , PC.REFUND_FROM_TEL), 'D' ) , '-', '') AS RETURN_HP , CASE WHEN PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB = '0' THEN CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.REFUND_FROM_ADDR, 'D') ELSE (SELECT CWARE_ENC_DEC(HO.TO_ADDR, 'D') FROM TPAHALFORDERLIST HO WHERE PM.PA_ORDER_NO = HO.ORD_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = HO.ORD_NO_NM ) END AS RETURN_ADDR , REPLACE(PC.REFUND_FROM_ZI_CD , '-', '') AS RCVR_MAIL_NO , '001' AS RCVR_MAIL_NO_SEQ , CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.REFUND_FROM_ADDR, 'D') AS RCVR_BASE_ADDR , '' AS RCVR_DTLS_ADDR , CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(PC.REFUND_FROM_ZI_CD , '-', '')) = 6 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END AS RCVR_TYPE_ADD , NVL( (SELECT A.CS_LMS_CODE FROM TCSKINDS A WHERE A.CS_LMS_CODE = '6312' || PCC.CS_SGROUP) , '631299') AS CLAIM_CODE
, CASE WHEN PC.REFUND_DELI_PRI > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS CLM_LST_DLV_CST , TC.CODE_SNAME AS INSERT_ID , PC.REFUND_MEMO AS MSG FROM TPAORDERM PM /*반품접수건*/ , TPAORDERM OPM /*원주문건*/ , TPAHALFORDERLIST PC , TCODE TC , TPACLAIMCODE PCC WHERE PM.PA_ORDER_NO = OPM.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = OPM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PM.PA_CODE = OPM.PA_CODE AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = PC.ORD_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PC.ORD_NO_NM AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = PC.BASKET_NO AND PM.PA_CLAIM_NO = PC.CLAIM_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = PC.PA_ORDER_GB AND PM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND PC.PA_ORDER_GB = PM.PA_ORDER_GB AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '30' AND PM.CREATE_YN = '0' AND PM.PRE_CANCEL_YN = '0' AND PM.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND OPM.PA_ORDER_GB = '10' AND OPM.CREATE_YN = '1' AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = #{paOrderNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = #{paOrderSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{paGroupCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CLAIM_NO = #{paClaimNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O500' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = PM.PA_GROUP_CODE AND PC.REFUND_STATE = PCC.PA_CLAIM_CODE(+) AND PCC.CLAIM_GB(+) = '30' AND PCC.PA_CODE(+) = '12' ) CL

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectOrderClaimTargetDt20 by PaHalfAsyncController*/ PM.MAPPING_SEQ , PM.PA_ORDER_NO , PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ , PM.PA_CLAIM_NO , OPM.ORDER_NO , OPM.ORDER_G_SEQ , OPM.ORDER_D_SEQ , OPM.ORDER_W_SEQ , PM.PA_ORDER_GB AS CLAIM_GB , PM.PA_PROC_QTY AS CLAIM_QTY , '하프클럽 취소(출고전 반품)' AS CLAIM_DESC , PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB AS OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , '' AS CUST_DELY_YN , '' AS RETURN_DELY_GB , '' AS RETURN_SLIP_NO , PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , '0' AS ADMIN_PROC_YN , '' AS RETURN_NAME , '' AS RETURN_TEL , '' AS RETURN_HP , '' AS RETURN_ADDR , '' AS RCVR_MAIL_NO , '' AS RCVR_MAIL_NO_SEQ , '' AS RCVR_BASE_ADDR , '' AS RCVR_DTLS_ADDR , '' AS RCVR_TYPE_ADD , NVL( (SELECT A.CS_LMS_CODE FROM TCSKINDS A WHERE A.CS_LMS_CODE = '6212' || PCC.CS_SGROUP) , '621299') AS CLAIM_CODE , 0 AS CLM_LST_DLV_CST , TC.CODE_SNAME AS INSERT_ID FROM TPAORDERM PM /* 출하지시 이후 취소 접수건 */ , TPAORDERM OPM /* 원주문건 */ , TPAHALFORDERLIST PC , TCODE TC , TPACLAIMCODE PCC WHERE PM.PA_ORDER_NO = OPM.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = OPM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PM.PA_CODE = OPM.PA_CODE AND OPM.PA_ORDER_NO = PC.ORD_NO AND OPM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PC.ORD_NO_NM AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = PC.BASKET_NO AND PC.PA_ORDER_GB = PM.PA_ORDER_GB AND PM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND PM.CREATE_YN = '0' AND PM.PRE_CANCEL_YN = '0' AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '20' AND PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB = '1' AND PM.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND OPM.PA_ORDER_GB = '10' AND OPM.CREATE_YN = '1' AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = #{paOrderNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = #{paOrderSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{paGroupCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O500' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = PM.PA_GROUP_CODE AND PC.REFUND_STATE = PCC.PA_CLAIM_CODE(+) AND PCC.CLAIM_GB(+) = '20' AND PCC.PA_CODE(+) = '12'

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectOrderChangeTargetDtList by PaHalfAsyncController*/ CL.MAPPING_SEQ , CL.ORDER_NO , CL.ORDER_G_SEQ , CL.CLAIM_GB , CL.EXCH_GOODSDT_CODE , CL.CLAIM_QTY , CL.CLAIM_DESC , CL.CLAIM_CODE , CL.RETURN_NAME , CL.RETURN_TEL , CL.RETURN_HP , CL.RCVR_MAIL_NO , CL.RCVR_MAIL_NO_SEQ , CL.RCVR_BASE_ADDR , CL.RCVR_DTLS_ADDR , CL.RETURN_ADDR , CL.ADMIN_PROC_YN , CL.RCVR_TYPE_ADD , CL.PA_ORDER_GB , CL.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , CL.INSERT_ID , CL.PA_ORDER_NO , CL.PA_ORDER_SEQ , CL.PA_CLAIM_NO , CL.CLM_LST_DLV_CST , CL.CUST_DELY_YN , DECODE(CL.CUST_DELY_YN, '1', CL.RETURN_DELY_GB , '') AS RETURN_DELY_GB , DECODE(CL.CUST_DELY_YN, '1', CL.RETURN_SLIP_NO , '') AS RETURN_SLIP_NO , CL.MSG FROM ( SELECT PM.MAPPING_SEQ , OPM.ORDER_NO , OPM.ORDER_G_SEQ , PM.PA_ORDER_GB AS CLAIM_GB , PM.CHANGE_GOODSDT_CODE AS EXCH_GOODSDT_CODE , PM.PA_PROC_QTY AS CLAIM_QTY , PC.REFUND_BS_MEMO AS CLAIM_DESC , NVL( (SELECT A.CS_LMS_CODE FROM TCSKINDS A WHERE A.CS_LMS_CODE = '6412' || PCC.CS_SGROUP) , '641299') AS CLAIM_CODE , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_NM WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN PC.REFUND_FROM_NM END AS RETURN_NAME , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC( NVL(PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_TEL , REFUND_FROM_EM_TEL) ,'D') , '-', '') WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC( NVL(PC.REFUND_FROM_TEL , REFUND_FROM_EM_TEL) ,'D') , '-', '') END AS RETURN_TEL , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC( NVL(PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_EM_TEL , REFUND_FROM_TEL) ,'D') , '-', '') WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC( NVL(PC.REFUND_FROM_EM_TEL , REFUND_FROM_TEL) ,'D') , '-', '') END AS RETURN_HP , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_ZI_CD WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN PC.REFUND_FROM_ZI_CD END AS RCVR_MAIL_NO , '001' AS RCVR_MAIL_NO_SEQ , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_ADDR , 'D') WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.REFUND_FROM_ADDR , 'D') END AS RCVR_BASE_ADDR , '' AS RCVR_DTLS_ADDR , CASE WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.EXCHANGE_FROM_ADDR , 'D') WHEN PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '45' THEN CWARE_ENC_DEC(PC.REFUND_FROM_ADDR , 'D') END AS RETURN_ADDR , '1' AS ADMIN_PROC_YN , CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(PC.REFUND_FROM_ZI_CD , '-', '')) = 6 THEN '01' ELSE '02' END AS RCVR_TYPE_ADD , PM.PA_ORDER_GB , PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB , TC.CODE_SNAME AS INSERT_ID , PM.PA_ORDER_NO , PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ , PM.PA_CLAIM_NO
, CASE WHEN PC.EXCHANGE_DELI_PRI > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS CLM_LST_DLV_CST , DECODE(PC.BP_PICKUP_TYPE_NM, '업체직접수거', '0', '1') AS CUST_DELY_YN , NVL((SELECT CASE WHEN XX.PA_DELY_GB = '39' THEN '40' ELSE XX.DELY_GB END FROM (SELECT * FROM TPADELYGB G WHERE G.PA_CODE = '12' AND G.PA_DELY_GB = PC.DELIRTN_OFF_NO) XX WHERE ROWNUM = 1), '40') AS RETURN_DELY_GB , NVL(PC.DELIRTN_NO,'고객직접배송') AS RETURN_SLIP_NO , DECODE(PM.PA_ORDER_GB ,'40' ,PC.EXCHANGE_MEMO, PC.REFUND_MEMO) AS MSG FROM TPAORDERM PM /* 교환접수 건 */ , TPAORDERM OPM /* 원주문 건*/ , TPAHALFORDERLIST PC , TCODE TC , TPACLAIMCODE PCC WHERE PM.PA_ORDER_NO = OPM.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = OPM.PA_ORDER_SEQ AND PM.PA_CODE = OPM.PA_CODE AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = PC.ORD_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = PC.ORD_NO_NM AND PM.PA_CLAIM_NO = PC.CLAIM_NO AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = PC.BASKET_NO AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O500' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = PM.PA_GROUP_CODE AND PM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2') AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB IN ('40', '45') AND PC.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' AND OPM.PA_ORDER_GB = '10' AND PM.CREATE_YN = '0' AND PM.PRE_CANCEL_YN = '0' AND PM.OUT_BEF_CLAIM_GB = '0' AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = #{paOrderNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = #{paOrderSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CLAIM_NO = #{paClaimNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PC.EXCHANGE_STATE = PCC.PA_CLAIM_CODE(+) AND PCC.CLAIM_GB(+) = '40' AND PCC.PA_CODE(+) = '12' ) CL ORDER BY CL.PA_ORDER_GB ASC

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.compareAddress by PaHalfAsyncController*/ COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT OC.ORD_ADR , OC.CLM_ADR , OC.ORD_NAME , OC.CLM_NAME FROM( SELECT UPPER(REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(OL.TO_ADDR , 'd'), ' ', '')) AS ORD_ADR , CASE WHEN CL.PA_ORDER_GB = '30' THEN UPPER(REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(CL.REFUND_FROM_ADDR , 'd'), ' ', '')) WHEN CL.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN UPPER(REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(CL.EXCHANGE_FROM_ADDR , 'd'), ' ', '')) ELSE UPPER(REPLACE(CWARE_ENC_DEC(CL.REFUND_FROM_ADDR , 'd'), ' ', '')) END AS CLM_ADR , NVL(OL.FROM_NM , OL.TO_NM) AS ORD_NAME , CASE WHEN CL.PA_ORDER_GB = '30' THEN CL.REFUND_FROM_NM WHEN CL.PA_ORDER_GB = '40' THEN CL.EXCHANGE_FROM_NM ELSE CL.REFUND_FROM_NM END AS CLM_NAME
FROM TPAHALFORDERLIST OL , TPAHALFORDERLIST CL WHERE OL.ORD_NO = CL.ORD_NO AND OL.ORD_NO_NM = CL.ORD_NO_NM AND OL.PA_ORDER_GB = '10' AND CL.PA_ORDER_GB = #{paOrderGb , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OL.ORD_NO = #{paOrderNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OL.ORD_NO_NM = #{paOrderSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CL.CLAIM_NO = #{paClaimNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) OC ) TB WHERE TB.ORD_ADR = TB.CLM_ADR AND TB.ORD_NAME = TB.CLM_NAME

SELECT /* pahalfclaim.xml : pahalf.claim.selectReturnStt by PaHalfClaimController*/ PM.MAPPING_SEQ , PA_DO_FLAG FROM TPAHALFORDERLIST HL , TPAORDERM PM WHERE PM.PA_ORDER_NO = HL.ORD_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_SEQ = HL.ORD_NO_NM AND PM.PA_SHIP_NO = HL.BASKET_NO AND PM.PA_CLAIM_NO = HL.CLAIM_NO AND HL.ORD_NO = #{ordNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HL.ORD_NO_NM = #{ordNoNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HL.BASKET_NO = #{basketNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HL.PA_ORDER_GB = #{paOrderGb , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HL.CLAIM_REQUEST_DATE = TO_CHAR(#{claimRequestDate , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND HL.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB = '30' AND PM.PA_CODE IN ('C1', 'C2')
